name: 2015 the 4th Asia-Pacific International Congress on Engineering & Natural Sciences
content: 2015 the 4rd Asia-Pacific International Congress on Engineering & Natural Sciences (APICENS 2015) is for the scientists, scholars, engineers and students from Universities all around the world and the industry to present ongoing research activities, and hence to foster research relations between universities and industry. This conference provides opportunities for the delegates to exchange new ideas and application experiences face to face, to establish business or research relations and to find global partners for future collaboration.
